intro.quote: Classic cars never die, they are reborn...
content: As witness of the history of the brand and with the deep awareness of our responsability on its legacy and heritage, we provide our expertise to restore and preserve some of the most iconic models.
At Type901, we only take care of a few units each year.
Some of them are special projects requested by our customers, the rest are valuable cars that we've found around the globe and may sell or not once completed .

content.title: Scheduled maintenance
content.description: Factory-specification service intervals using original techniques and approved materials.

content.title: Mechanical repairs
content.description: Expert diagnosis and repair of all mechanical systems with genuine or NOS parts.

content.title: Bodywork & Paint
content.description: Expert diagnosis and repair of all bodywork systems with genuine or NOS parts.

content.title: Preservation Services
content.description: Preventive care and storage solutions to protect your investment.
